title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 204.12 - Liquor; intoxicating beverages; drugs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 204.12 - Liquor; intoxicating beverages; drugs

State Regulations

No person shall consume any intoxicating beverage or any
illegal or prohibited drug while such person is in a vehicle on the authority
facilities or while such person is on the authority
facilities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
204.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
